import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid, } from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; import StickyFooter from 'react-sticky-footer'; const Cards = ( { data: { confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate}}) => { if(!confirmed) { return 'Loading....'; } return(
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number Of Active Cases Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number Of Recovered Cases Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number Of Deaths
) } export default Cards;
